hadith.text: Narrated An-Nu'man bin Bashir: That the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: "Indeed Khamr comes from wheat, Khamr comes from barely, Khamr comes from dates, Khamr comes from rasins, and Khamr comes from honey." He said: There are narrations on this topic from Abu Hurairah. [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Gharib
